comments.author: Terry
comments.body: D'OH! man, you aren't messing around are you?! i thought we'd have a few weeks to work up to this... guess i shoulda known better. no worries-- i'll accept the challenge. assuming walker is dry enough to ride by then, i'll do my best to represent for the fat tire crowd (even if i arrive at the trailhead an hour after all you lung busters). see you tuesday. terry

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: don't all jump up at once to join us! terry

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: well so maybe it wasn't "super", but it sure was fun! steve "ironman" bailey shamed me on the climbs, even though he'd already ridden to the kansas border and back during his lunch hour that same day. guess i need a few (hundred) more base miles under my belt... terry
